00017 // stage1 is no flicker of the shield, changes colors
00018 // in stage2 the shield flickers fast, changes colors
00019 // in stage3 the shield flashes slow, no color change
00020 #define ANKH_STAGE1_TIME    750
00021 #define ANKH_STAGE2_TIME    380
00022 #define ANKH_STAGE3_TIME    125
00023 #define PLAY_ANKH_TIME      (ANKH_STAGE1_TIME+ANKH_STAGE2_TIME+ANKH_STAGE3_TIME)
00024 // these correspond stage 1,2 and 3 respectively
00025

00035  }
